statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 5 \\ -8 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 8 \\ -11 \\ -17 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
